## Classes Index

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gsym/dwarftransformer">DwarfTransformer</a></>}>
A class that transforms the DWARF in a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfcontext">DWARFContext</a> into GSYM information by populating the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gsym/gsymcreator">GsymCreator</a> object that it is constructed with. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gsym/dwarftransformer/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A class that transforms the DWARF in a DWARFContext into GSYM information</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// allows this class to be unit tested.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This function will find all DW&#95;TAG&#95;subprogram DIEs that convert them into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// GSYM FuntionInfo objects and add them to the GsymCreator supplied during</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// with calls to this function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// warnings. Once a thread has finished parsing an entire compile unit, all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// information in this temporary stream will be forwarded to the member</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// variable log. This keeps logging thread safe. If the value is NULL, then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// don&#39;t log.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// information.</span></CodeLine>
